abstract: Successful business people don't always take big risks all of the time -- or at any time.
snippet: Successful business people don't always take big risks all of the time -- or at any time.
lead_paragraph: Carl Richards is a certified financial planner in Park City, Utah. His sketches are archived here on the Bucks blog and on his personal Web site, BehaviorGap.com.

headline.main: The Surprising Money Habits of Successful Entrepreneurs
